entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for March 13, 2024

summary.caption: “Now you listen to me, Miss Billings! You have not seen a thing here—do you understand? I’m not kidding about this, Miss Billings.”

summary.caption: Gus Ferguson: recipient of the first brain bypass operation.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for March 13, 2024
The Far Side comic 5 for March 13, 2024

summary.caption: “I don’t mean to exacerbate this situation, Roger, but I think I’m quite close to bursting into maniacal laughter and imagining your nose is really a German sausage.”
